newsitem.title: USA: US Freightways Q1 net soars on revenue gain.
newsitem.headline: US Freightways Q1 net soars on revenue gain.

text.p: US Freightways Corp said Thursday its earnings in the first quarter ended March 29 was more than double year-ago results due in part to a sharp increase in revenues.

The less-than-truckload shipping company reported net income of $9.7 million, or $0.40 a share, compared to $4.3 million, or $0.20 a share, one year ago. Revenues in the period were $355.8 million, up from $313.7 million last year.
US Freightways said 1996 results were also adversely affected by severe winter weather in the northeast.
The company's shares were up 11/16 Thursday at 27-3/4.
